dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, President Tokayev was pretty busy, it seems, celebrating Police Day recently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, President Tokayev was pretty busy, it seems, celebrating Police Day recently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev attended a concert dedicated to Police Day, citing Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, absolutely! Akorda actually reported he attended this big concert dedicated to it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, absolutely! Akorda actually reported he attended this big concert dedicated to it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev attended a concert dedicated to Police Day, citing Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, a concert. And, like, who all was there? Was it just, um, officers?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, a concert. And, like, who all was there? Was it just, um, officers?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh no, it was a huge gathering. We're talking leaders of law enforcement, current officers from the Ministry of Internal Affairs, veterans...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh no, it was a huge gathering. We're talking leaders of law enforcement, current officers from the Ministry of Internal Affairs, veterans...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The event was held as part of the thematic week Law and Order and brought together leaders of law enforcement agencies, officers of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, veterans, and families of police officers who gave their lives in the line of duty to protect others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] ...and even families of officers who, you know, tragically lost their lives in the line of duty.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...and even families of officers who, you know, tragically lost their lives in the line of duty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The event was held as part of the thematic week Law and Order and brought together leaders of law enforcement agencies, officers of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, veterans, and families of police officers who gave their lives in the line of duty to protect others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, which, uh, that must have been incredibly touching. They even had a requiem in memory of them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, which, uh, that must have been incredibly touching. They even had a requiem in memory of them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A touching moment came with a requiem in memory of fallen law enforcement officers, honoring those who died while serving their country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I saw that. And, um, apparently students from police cadet classes performed a song called "Zhas Sakshy," or "Young Guardian." That's really sweet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I saw that. And, um, apparently students from police cadet classes performed a song called "Zhas Sakshy," or "Young Guardian." That's really sweet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Another heartfelt highlight was the performance of the song "Zhas Sakshy" ("Young Guardian") by students of police cadet classes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: A nice touch, definitely. Just for context, Police Day in Kazakhstan is celebrated on June 23rd.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A nice touch, definitely. Just for context, Police Day in Kazakhstan is celebrated on June twenty third.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Police Day is celebrated in Kazakhstan on June 23.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Ah, okay. So this concert was part of a larger, like, thematic week, "Law and Order."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ah, okay. So this concert was part of a larger, like, thematic week, "Law and Order."
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The event was held as part of the thematic week Law and Order and brought together leaders of law enforcement agencies, officers of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, veterans, and families of police officers who gave their lives in the line of duty to protect others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Mmm-hmm. But earlier that day, the President was actually at an extended session with law enforcement agencies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mmm-hmm. But earlier that day, the President was actually at an extended session with law enforcement agencies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier in the day, the Head of State spoke at an extended session of law enforcement agencies, addressing unresolved issues that pose threats to national security.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right. And he was apparently talking about, uh, some pretty serious stuff there, like national security threats?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right. And he was apparently talking about, uh, some pretty serious stuff there, like national security threats?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier in the day, the Head of State spoke at an extended session of law enforcement agencies, addressing unresolved issues that pose threats to national security.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he really highlighted unresolved issues that could, you know, jeopardize national security. Pretty heavy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he really highlighted unresolved issues that could, you know, jeopardize national security. Pretty heavy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier in the day, the Head of State spoke at an extended session of law enforcement agencies, addressing unresolved issues that pose threats to national security.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Sounds like it. And then he also pushed for them to prepare for upcoming reforms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like it. And then he also pushed for them to prepare for upcoming reforms.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Tokayev also called on law enforcement to prepare for upcoming reforms and emphasized the need for a new culture of public engagement within the police force.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh, and crucially, he emphasized the need for a whole new culture of public engagement within the police force.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh, and crucially, he emphasized the need for a whole new culture of public engagement within the police force.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Which is, like, so important, right? Building that trust with the community.

dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. A good move, I think.
